name: Bone
description: A series of bones joined together, mostly used by shamans and wildlings.
armor: Replaces the metal. While wearing a medium or heavy armor (non hide) made with bones, you gain a +3 bonus to Charisma (Intimidation) checks you make.

name: Chitin
description: These flexible shells of chitinous creatures such as giant crabs or remorhaz are used to craft armors, known to be lighter than metallic armors.
armor: Replaces the metal. While wearing a medium armor (non hide) made with chitin, the armor's dexterity bonus increases by 1. Heavy armors made with chitin reduce the Strength requirement by 1.

name: Creature Essence
description: All creatures are different, but they're grouped up in types which determines their fundamental nature.
weapon: Can be used to craft specific slaying weapons such as an arrow of dragon slaying.
other: Can be used to craft specific potions, alchemical concoctions, and magic items such as a brazier of commanding fire elementals.

name: Ellond Hide
description: This brown-orange hide is harvested from desert and dry areas creatures.
armor: While wearing clothing or a hide armor made with ellond hide, fire damage you take is reduced by 3. Harvested ellond hide from a CR 9 or higher creature can be used to craft a hide armor of fire resistance.

name: Monster Feathers
description: Hippogriffs, Rocs, giant eagles and other flying creatures have beautiful feathers used to show their majesty.
armor: While wearing clothing or any non-metallic armor made with monster feathers, you gain a +3 bonus to Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks you make.
other: Harvested monster feathers from a CR 9 or higher creature can be used to craft a Quaal's feather token.

name: Monster Scales
description: Scales harvested from creatures, with a variety of colors, shapes and sizes.
armor: Replaces the metal. Used to craft a scale mail armor. Harvested monster scales from a CR 13 or higher dragon can be used to craft a dragon scale mail.

name: Shadowsilk
description: This black semi-transparent silk is carefully made by underground spiders and spider-like creatures.
armor: While wearing clothing or any non-metallic armor made with shadowsilk, you gain a +3 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks you make in lightly obscured areas (such as tree shadows). Harvested shadowsilk from a CR 13 or higher creature can be used to craft a cloak of arachnida.

name: Adamantine
description: A shiny black metal, known as one of the hardest substances in existence.
armor: Used to craft the adamantine armor.
weapon: When you hit an object with an adamantine weapon or piece of ammunition, the hit is a critical hit.

name: Asmoroch Steel
description: A black scorched-like metal which is cold to touch.
armor: Used to craft an armor of necrotic resistance (metallic armor only)
weapon: Used to craft necrotic damage dealing weapons, such as the sword of life stealing.

name: Cold Iron
description: This iron is worked entirely while cold, known for its effectiveness against fey and demonic creatures.
weapons: When you hit a fey or a fiend with a cold iron weapon, you can roll the damage again and use either result.

name: Darksteel
description: A darkened blue metal that only forms in areas affected by thunderstorms, known for having that energy inside of it.
armor: Used to craft an armor of lightning resistance (metallic armor only).
weapons: Used to craft lightning damage dealing weapons, such as the javelin of lightning.
other: Used to craft lightning damage dealing magic items, such as the wand of lightning bolt.

name: Dwarvenstone
description: This marble-like ore is used by dwarves to create their ceremonial armor for the defenders of their cities, even though is heavier and bulkier than other metallic armors.
armor: Used to craft a dwarven plate.

name: Infernal Steel
description: A blood red metal found in the infernal planes which is very resistant and captures the hot and flames.
armor: Used to craft an armor of fire resistance (metallic armor only) or a demon armor.
weapon: Used to craft fire damage dealing weapons, such as the flame tongue.
other: Used to craft fire damage dealing magic items, such as the staff of fire.

name: Mitrhal
description: This white-silver metal is lighter and flexible than common steel.
armor: Used to craft the mithral armor.
weapon: Two handed weapons made with mithral lose the heavy property and all the other weapons gain the light feature.

name: Orichalcum
description: This bronze orange metal is used to absorb the essence of magic.
armor: Used to craft an armor of force resistance (metallic armor only).
other: Used to craft anti-magic items, such as the ring of mind shielding.

name: Plaguesteel
description: This ancient mossy-like metal has small spores floating around it.
weapon: Used to craft poison damage dealing weapons, such as the dagger of venom.
other: Used to craft poison damage dealing magic items, such as the staff of the adder.

name: Stellar Iron
description: A white bright metal, soft on touch but very resistant, known for being used by celestial beings.
armor: Used to craft an armor of radiant resistance (metallic armor only).
weapon: Used to craft radiant damage dealing weapons, such as the sun blade.

name: Aerocrystal
description: A light blue, glass-like crystal known for creating quick, precise weapons.
weapon: You can use your Dexterity modifier for attacks and damage made with an aerocrystal weapon.

name: Coral
description: Mostly used by sea and waterborne creatures to create their weapons and armors.
armor: Replaces the metal. While wearing a medium or heavy armor (non hide) made with coral, you speed while swimming increases by 10 feet.
weapons: Any melee weapon made with coral doesn't have disadvantage on the attacks rolls while underwater.

name: Darkwood
description: This piece of wood is as hard as normal wood but very light.
armor: Replaces the metal of any medium or heavy armor.

name: Eternal Ice
description: This cold white-blue block of ice resist high temperatures, being unable to melt in normal conditions.
weapon: Used to craft cold damage dealing weapons, such as the frost brand.
other: Used to craft cold damage dealing magic items, such as the staff of frost.

name: Ignum
description: This black semi-translucent stone have some lava-like glowing and flowing inside of it.
weapon: Used to craft fire damage dealing weapons, such as the flame tongue.

name: Infernal Leather
description: A reddish hard leather created in the infernal planes.
armor: Used to craft an armor of fire resistance (leather or studded leather).

name: Leafweave
description: Alchemically processed leaves that are hard as leather, used also as camouflage.
other: Used to craft the boots of elvenkind and the cloak of elvenkind.

name: Obsidian
description: This black to deep purple glass-like stone is known to be very sharp.
armor: While wearing a medium or heavy armor (non hide) made with obsidian, when an enemy tries to grapple you, it takes 1d4 slashing damage.
weapons: Used for crafting the sword of sharpness.

name: Shadowfell Linen
description: A dark and purple linen found in the shadowfell.
armor: Used to craft an armor of psychic resistance (leather or studded leater).

name: Spiritual wood
description: This cyan-like wood has a natural connection with the magic.
armor: Replaces the metal of any medium or heavy armor. While wearing an spiritual wood armor, you gain a +3 bonus to concentration checks to maintain a spell.
